    About ML-LPA

    Contributor(s)

    ML-LPA have been designed and is maintained by the following persons:

    • Vivien Walter, Department of Chemistry, King’s College London (London, UK) — Website

    • Olivier Benzerara, Institut Charles Sadron, CNRS (Strasbourg, FR)

    • Celine Ruscher, Institut Charles Sadron, CNRS (Strasbourg, FR)

    Cite us

    You can cite ML-LPA by citing the following article

    Walter Vivien, Ruscher Celine, Benzerara Olivier, Marques Carlos M and Thalmann Fabrice, A machine learning study of the two states model for lipid bilayer phase transitions, Phys. Chem. Chem. Phys. (2020), 22, 19147-19154

    Reference(s)

    The following articles are using ML-LPA:

    • Walter et al., A machine learning study of the two states model for lipid bilayer phase transitions, (2020), 22, 19147-19154 DOI: 10.1039/D0CP02058C
